Package model

Contains the circuit model and implements logic for running the simulation.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
And2Gate And2Gate extends the abstract class LogicComponent, implementing the logic required to simulate a two-input AND gate.
And3Gate And3Gate extends the abstract class LogicComponent, implementing the logic required to simulate a three-input AND gate.
And4Gate And4Gate extends the abstract class LogicComponent, implementing the logic required to simulate a four-input AND gate.
Button Button extends the abstract class LogicComponent, implementing the logic required to simulate a push button.
CustomComponent CustomComponent extends the abstract class LogicComponent and provides customizable functionality.
DFlipFlop DFlipFlopGate extends the abstract class LogicComponent, implementing the logic required to simulate a D Flip-Flop.
Ground Ground extends the abstract class LogicComponent, implementing the logic required to simulate a grounded terminal.
HexDigit HexDigit extends the abstract class LogicComponent, implementing the logic required to simulate a display capable of showing a four bit number in hexadecimal.
JKFlipFlop JKFlipFlopGate extends the abstract class LogicComponent, implementing the logic required to simulate a JK Flip-Flop.
LED LED extends the abstract class LogicComponent, implementing the logic required to simulate a light-emitting diode.
LogicComponent LogicComponent is the abstract class that all components extend.
LogicComponentFactory Provides functionality for creating LogicComponent objects from a given type string.
Model A Model is the logical representation of a collection of circuits.
Nand2Gate Nand2Gate extends the abstract class LogicComponent, implementing the logic required to simulate a two-input NAND gate.
Nand3Gate Nand3Gate extends the abstract class LogicComponent, implementing the logic required to simulate a three-input NAND gate.
Nand4Gate Nand3Gate extends the abstract class LogicComponent, implementing the logic required to simulate a four-input NAND gate.
Nor2Gate Nor2Gate extends the abstract class LogicComponent, implementing the logic required to simulate a two-input NAND gate.
Nor3Gate Nor3Gate extends the abstract class LogicComponent, implementing the logic required to simulate a three-input NAND gate.
Nor4Gate Nand3Gate extends the abstract class LogicComponent, implementing the logic required to simulate a four-input NAND gate.
NotGate NotGate extends the abstract class LogicComponent, implementing the logic required to simulate a NOT gate.
Or2Gate Or2Gate extends the abstract class LogicComponent, implementing the logic required to simulate a two-input OR gate.
Or3Gate Or3Gate extends the abstract class LogicComponent, implementing the logic required to simulate a three-input OR gate.
Or4Gate Or4Gate extends the abstract class LogicComponent, implementing the logic required to simulate a four-input OR gate.
StateChange Encapsulates the information necessary to change the output value of a component.
Switch Switch extends the abstract class LogicComponent, implementing the logic required to simulate a toggle switch.
Vcc Vcc extends the abstract class LogicComponent, implementing the logic required to simulate a grounded terminal.
Wire A Wire object represents the logical aspect of a wire in the model.
WireFactory Provides functionality for creating Wire objects.
Xor2Gate Xor2Gate extends the abstract class LogicComponent, implementing the logic required to simulate a two-input XOR gate.
 

Package model Description

Contains the circuit model and implements logic for running the simulation.

The main classes in the model package are:

  • Model: Contains the circuit model
  • LogicComponent: The base class for creating components
  • Wire: Represents the visual connection between two components
